entry.title: Transcripts from coredev.tech Amsterdam 2019 meeting
entry.summary: The notes from the coredev.tech Amsterdam 2019 meeting are available through various links provided in the context. These links include conversations about code review process, problems faced by maintainers, wallet re-architecture, consensus cleanup, SIGHASH_NOINPUT, OP_CHECKSIGFROMSTACK, OP_CHECKOUTPUTSHASHVERIFY and OP_SECURETHEBAG, taproot discussion, Utreexo, assumeutxo, hardware wallets and HWI, bip151, p2p encryption and v2 message format, signet for bitcoin test networks, and statechains overview. The links provide detailed insights into different aspects of Bitcoin Core development.
